subject: Self Care
title: Values Clarification
description: A micro-lesson that makes Values Clarification usable.

hook.text: You said yes to the promotion and felt empty. The job paid well but violated something you couldn't name.

buildup.text: That unnamed thing was a value. Values are the principles that define what matters most to your sense of self.

discovery.text: When actions align with values, you feel authentic. When they clash, you feel drained â€” even while succeeding.

twist.text: Most people inherit values from culture or family without questioning them. Unexamined values cause invisible friction.

climax.text: List your top five values. Check if your daily life honors them. Misalignment is the hidden source of distress.

punchline.text: Know your values. Live by them. That's self-awareness.

quiz.question: What happens when actions consistently clash with personal values?
options: Nothing â€” values are just words
You feel drained even while outwardly succeeding
Values change automatically to match actions
